cab.content: -0$ i nSECRET.BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - APRIL 15th 1918,1. On the LYS Battle Front no further attacks have developed tcday and the general situation is unchanged^2. On the rest of the Front there is nothing to report.General Staff,War Office, S.W.I..15th April, 1918, Issued at 6.15 p.m.
